channel.title: [FM] Valkyria Chronicles - Game Thread - GAME END - Empire & Journalist victory!
channel.description:
https://assets1.ignimgs.com/2018/09/18/valkyriachronicles4-1280-1537312016800_400w.jpg
# [color]Rules:[/color]
* [color=ligblue]Moderators》[/color]@eevee. Send all actions to him.
* [color=lightblue]Respect》[/color] Be respectful, if you don't know what's in the boundries and what is out then ask the Moderators
* [color=ligblue]Mod Messages》[/color]Do not quote or post any messages from the moderator.
* [color=lightblue]Flavour》[/color]Flavour is based on Valkyria Chronicles game series. Flavour is important to pay attention to.
* [color=ligblue]Lynch》[/color]The lynch is plurality based. In the event of a tie, a random player is decided upon.
* [color=lightblue]Voting》[/color]Vote in a seperate paragraph not in spoilers and bold. Otherwise, we have no obligation to count it.
* [color=ligblue] ITA》[/color]ITAs will exist. Each class will have different statistics when it comes to ITAs. A table explaining this will be posted before the game starts if a number of players required for ITAs is reached.
* [color=lightblue]Shooting》[/color]Typing /shoot name in the thread with the name being the player (other than you) you wish to shoot.
* [color=ligblue]Flips》[/color]When a player dies under regular conditions their rolecard will be revealed in the thread. Any hidden information will be revealed in the card. The source of the the kill will not be revealed.
* [color=lightblue]Leaders, setup and action processing》[/color]There will be a lot of power roles in this setup. However, there will be a maximum of active actions which each non-scum faction can submit. This limit is twice the number of alive players with "leader" passive. If this limit is exceeded - **ALL ACTIONS OF THIS FACTION WILL FAIL**.
* [color=ligblue]Replacements》[/color]If a slot needs to be replaced and their is no immediate replacement then that slot will be modkilled. Players seeking to use this for their factions advantage will receive extra punishment.
* [color=lightblue]Spam》[/color]Due to the large nature of the game please try and keep everything in a limit number of posts as opposed to multiple quick one-liners.
## [color]Players:[/color] 1. GamerPoke - [color=]Aulard Abington[/color] - [Dead day 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-day-2-25-29/74858/11161) 2. PKR - [color=]Edy Nelson[/color] - [Dead day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-day-2-25-29/74858/5305) 3. Icibalus 4. Luxy - CLEANED - Dead day 3 5. Solic - [color=FF0000] Maximillian[/color] - [Lynched day 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-night-3-13-29/74858/12656) 6. Wazza - [color=]Fressia York[/color] - [Dead day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-day-2-22-29/74858/6660) 7. Margaret - [color=FF0000]Berthold Gregor[/color]- [Dead night 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-night-3-12-29/74858/12677) 8. MaximusPrime - [color=]Raz[/color] - [Dead night 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-night-3-12-29/74858/12674) 9. Firekitten 10. Insanity - [color=]Zaka[/color] - [Dead day 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-day-1-28-29/74858/1289) 11. BlueStorm - [color=]Alicia Melchiott[/color] - [Dead night 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-day-2-25-29/74858/5133) 12. H_Hjasik - [color=FF0000] Nikola Graf[/color] - [Dead day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-day-2-22-29/74858/6652) 13. DatBird - [color]Cezary Regard[/color] - [Dead day 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-day-3-15-29/74858/12414) 14. Alice - [color=FF0000]Heinrich Belgar[/color] - [Dead day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-day-2-24-29/74858/6416) 15. Meteoro - [color=]Christel Ward[/color] - [Dead night 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-night-3-12-29/74858/12675) 16. Isaac - [color=]Audrey Heitinga[/color] - [Dead day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-day-2-20-29/74858/7122) 17. PoisonedSquid - [color=]Kai Schulen[/color] - Dead day 4 18. Geyde - [color=]Dan Bentley[/color][Dead night 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-night-3-12-29/74858/12676) 19. orangeandblack5 20. Sam17z - [color=]Viola Bryce[/color] - [Dead day 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-day-3-14-29/74858/12443) 25. psychoneirik - [color=red]Crymaria Levin[/color] - [Dead day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-day-2-24-29/74858/6281) 26. Soulshade55r 27. Frostwolf103 - [color=]Aoife[/color] - [Dead day 4](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-valkyria-chronicles-game-thread-day-4-7-29/74858/13294) 28. item.title: [FM] Valkyria Chronicles - Game Thread - GAME END - Empire & Journalist victory!
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
I didn’t experience much frustration really (probably because I expected your playstyle? ), but I did feel you weren’t a clear player within our team, whereas you were active enough to do so.

That’s a problem that is larger on this site, where scum just doesn’t work together and scumchat is barren. Mostly this relates to at least one of the scum not having the activity necessary for it, but that wasn’t the case with us.

Read full topic
